title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to the field, the search results are not selected.
OB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the external jar using Build 200201151, the search results are not selected.
EB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the external jar using Build 200201151, you should get 3 matches and the search results should be selected in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Perform a search for references to the selected field in the external jar.
